title: Classic Irving Park Garden Apartment
map_address: N St Louis Ave near W Montrose Ave
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Classic Irving Park Garden apartment unit at an affordable rent with all utilities, gas and electric, and heat included. A one bedroom with tile and ceramic floors throughout. Highly upgraded bathroom with shower, no tub. Lovely, beautiful greenery and natural light from all windows. Outside the back door on the garden level without leaving the unit is a full size, side x side, washer and dryer with free usage. Intimate 2 unit plus garden unit building with usage of yard. The unit is pet friendly with owner's approval of pet(s). Ideal location easily suited for public transportation via Irving Park bus to red or blue line, Kimball bus to blue line or walk. Very secure nice building on a quiet block. Beautiful back yard. Non-smoking building.   Requirements: Income must be 3x monthly rent 650 min credit score   No Security Deposit required, but a $450 non-refundable fee.
